snippet: As the military-backed government filed new criminal charges against Mohamed Morsi, the deposed president, human rights groups called the allegations preposterous.
abstract: Egypt's military-backed government files new criminal charges against deposed president Mohamed Morsi, accusing him of participating in an epic terrorist plot that involved killing protesters and leaking state secrets to the Iranian Revolutionary Guards.
lead_paragraph: As the military-backed government filed new criminal charges against Mohamed Morsi, the deposed president, human rights groups called the allegations preposterous.

headline.main: Egypt Accuses Morsi of Vast Terrorist Plot
headline.print_headline: Egypt Accuses Morsi of Vast Terrorist Plot
